analysis.description:
District0xContribution.district0xNetworkToken (/unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#1061-1062) shadows:
	- HasNoTokens.district0xNetworkToken (/unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#1050)
MiniMeToken.isContract (/unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#631-638) is declared view but contains assembly code

Reentrancy in MiniMeToken.approve (/unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#373-393):
	External calls:
	- ! TokenController(controller).onApprove(msg.sender,_spender,_amount) (/unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#389-390)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- allowed (/unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#390-391)

MiniMeToken.balances (/unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#227-228) shadows:
	- ERC20.balances (/unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#128)

MiniMeToken.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#668-685) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_claimer,balance) (/unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#683)

HasNoTokens.reclaimToken (/unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#1057-1060) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenInst.transfer(msg.sender,balance) (/unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#1059-1060)

District0xContribution.compensateContributors (/unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#1235-1264) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-district0xNetworkToken.transfer(contributorAddress,contributors[contributorAddress].amountCompensated) (/unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#1255-1258)

District0xContribution.setDistrict0xNetworkToken (/unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#1365-1390) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-district0xNetworkToken.generateTokens(this,FOUNDER1_STAKE.add(FOUNDER2_STAKE).add(EARLY_CONTRIBUTOR_STAKE).add(ADVISER_STAKE.mul(2)).add(ADVISER_STAKE2.mul(2)).add(COMMUNITY_ADVISERS_STAKE).add(CONTRIB_PERIOD1_STAKE)) (/unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#1378-1386)
	-district0xNetworkToken.generateTokens(multisigWallet,CONTRIB_PERIOD2_STAKE.add(CONTRIB_PERIOD3_STAKE)) (/unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#1386-1390)
SafeMath.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#46-54) shadows built-in symbol "assert"

MiniMeToken.getValueAt.min (local variable @ /unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#599) shadows:
	- MiniMeToken.min (function @ /unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#645-646)

VestedToken.calculateVestedTokens.vestedTokens (local variable @ /unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#916-927) shadows:
	- VestedToken.vestedTokens (function @ /unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#962-966)

District0xContribution.compensateContributors has external calls inside a loop:
	- district0xNetworkToken.transfer(contributorAddress,contributors[contributorAddress].amountCompensated) (/unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#1255-1258)

District0xContribution.setContribPeriod has external calls inside a loop:
	- district0xNetworkToken.revokeAllTokenGrants(advisers[j]) (/unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#1286)

MiniMeToken.isContract uses assembly (/unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#631-638)
	- /unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#634-637

MiniMeToken.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#197)
VestedToken.MAX_GRANTS_PER_ADDRESS should be constant (/unique_chucks/1/0x0abdace70d3790235af448c88547603b945604ea.sol#743-744)
